reviews.review:
Данная игра очень интересна, но! 1)После обновления(когда кс стала бесплатной) в игру стало практически невозможно играть , т.к повсюду начали появляться читеры или не адекватные дети! 2)На пабликах стали появляться различные баги!
Итог: Игру я рекомендую! Она интересная)))   :З

Bu oyun gerçekten bir devrim oyunudur ama son güncellemelerden sonra pay2win olan bir oyun oldu gerçekten bu duruma üzüldüm cs go sen zula değilsin sen yılların oyunusun ama eğer gerçekten vakit harcamak ve arkadaş ortamı edinmek istiyorsanız bu oyunu tavsiye ediyorum
love the game even know i'm not the best. i feel like the game has not changed that much since the game went free but thats because i'm in prime matchmaking. overall great game and my fav.

Originally I was trying to say there is no hacker cause i have only met 1 hacker after I have played for about 100 hours.But it turns out I cant meet a hacker because i bought the prime status at the beginning .When I match with someone who dont have a prime,there is 99 percent that you will meet a hacker(hackers most of the time).And they really affect my gaming experience.So even this game is free for download,it takes 15 USD to gain a real csgo gaming experience.However,it is still the best gun game I have ever met.In this game no matter how much money your opponent has spent,you all still get the same weapon(it wont become more powerful cause you cant actually upgrade anything in the game).Moreover there is almost no bug in all maps and thats so nice.Recommend for training aiming skills.
ps skins are so cool,some of them are cheap but better than expensive skins
